languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс властным жестом останавливает вас.{/n} "Я ограничиваю ваши полномочия, Вольный Торговец. Я еще не выслушал все... все, что Эмелине есть сказать".
{n}Heinrix stops you with an imperious gesture.{/n} "I am restricting your authority here, Rogue Trader. I have not yet heard everything... everything that Emelina has to say."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс властным жестом останавливает вас.{/n} "Я ограничиваю ваши полномочия, Вольный Торговец. Я еще не выслушал все... все, что Эмелине есть сказать".

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix stops you with an imperious gesture.{/n} "I am restricting your authority here, Rogue Trader. I have not yet heard everything... everything that Emelina has to say."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}海因里希做了个充满威严的手势，阻止了你。{/n}“我在此限制你的权限，行商浪人。我还没有听完……艾米莉娜要说的一切。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix stops you with an imperious gesture.{/n} "I am restricting your authority here, Rogue Trader. I have not yet heard everything... everything that Emelina has to say."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希做了个充满威严的手势，阻止了你。{/n}“我在此限制你的权限，行商浪人。我还没有听完……艾米莉娜要说的一切。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix te detiene con un gesto imperioso.{/n} «Voy a limitar su autoridad por esta vez, Comerciante. Aún no he oído todo lo que... todo lo que Emelina tiene que decir».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix stops you with an imperious gesture.{/n} "I am restricting your authority here, Rogue Trader. I have not yet heard everything... everything that Emelina has to say."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix te detiene con un gesto imperioso.{/n} «Voy a limitar su autoridad por esta vez, Comerciante. Aún no he oído todo lo que... todo lo que Emelina tiene que decir».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは横柄な態度であなたを止める。{/n}「我は、ここでの御身の権限を制限します、自由開拓者。我は、まだすべてを聞いていません…エメリナさんが告げるべきすべてを」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix stops you with an imperious gesture.{/n} "I am restricting your authority here, Rogue Trader. I have not yet heard everything... everything that Emelina has to say."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは横柄な態度であなたを止める。{/n}「我は、ここでの御身の権限を制限します、自由開拓者。我は、まだすべてを聞いていません…エメリナさんが告げるべきすべてを」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix vous arrête d'un geste impérieux.{/n} « Je me vois contraint de restreindre votre autorité ici, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Je n'ai pas encore entendu... tout ce qu'Emelina a à dire. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix stops you with an imperious gesture.{/n} "I am restricting your authority here, Rogue Trader. I have not yet heard everything... everything that Emelina has to say."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix vous arrête d'un geste impérieux.{/n} « Je me vois contraint de restreindre votre autorité ici, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Je n'ai pas encore entendu... tout ce qu'Emelina a à dire. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix hält dich mit einer gebieterischen Geste auf.{/n} "Ich schränke hiermit Eure Autorität hier ein, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Ich habe noch nicht alles gehört ... was Emelina zu sagen hat."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix stops you with an imperious gesture.{/n} "I am restricting your authority here, Rogue Trader. I have not yet heard everything... everything that Emelina has to say."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix hält dich mit einer gebieterischen Geste auf.{/n} "Ich schränke hiermit Eure Autorität hier ein, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Ich habe noch nicht alles gehört ... was Emelina zu sagen hat."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, otoriter bir el hareketiyle seni durduruyor.{/n} "Buradaki yetkini sınırlıyorum Hür Tacir. Henüz her şeyi... Emelina'nın söyleyeceği her şeyi dinlemedim."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix stops you with an imperious gesture.{/n} "I am restricting your authority here, Rogue Trader. I have not yet heard everything... everything that Emelina has to say."
